entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saguenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
